name: Documaps.io Sitemap Importer
author: Paul Knittel

sections.description: Sitemaps created in documaps.io can be imported into WP using this plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the documaps-importer folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the ‘Tools’ -> ‘Documaps.io’ and follow the on screen instructions
sections.faq:
Do I need to use documaps.io?

Yes, the plugin is designed to import your documaps.io projects directly into WP.

What is documaps.io?

Annoyed at the existing options to create sitemaps, we have decided to build documaps. It’s a super fast platform, where you can create sitemaps using markdown in no time. It’s easy to get started and free during beta.
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • Initial commit. Import pages and menu working.
